name: Oryantal Prenses
description: This oriental tale for girls only. You will feel the wife of the sultan. We met near the Topkapi Palace, go to the harem. I'll tell you how to live wives and concubines of the Sultan. After that, in the palace park, we'll drink coffee and I'll teach you to read  coffee fortune telling. And to tell you about why the women of the harem came up with the language of flowers. After that we will visit the fabulous Hyurem Sultan's hamam , which is located in the heart of the old city. On the square between the Sultanahmet mosque and the temple's Hagia Sophia. I'll tell you all the secrets of the Turkish bath. I show you know how to enjoy life as a wife of the Sultan. We will spend two exciting hours in a luxurious hammam, gossip, enjoy a massage. And then let's go to dinner at a fine restaurant with Oriental cuisine. And try favorite dishes of Hyurem Sultan. For these great few hours we delve into a real oriental tale.
